title: How to Make Mango Marinade

steps.headline: Add all the ingredients to a food processor.
Blend thoroughly until you achieve a smooth texture.
Use this mixture to marinate pork, chicken, or other poultry products.

text: Prepare and measure all ingredients.  Add all the ingredients to a food processor.  Blend thoroughly until you achieve a smooth texture.  Use this mixture to marinate pork, chicken, or other poultry products.
